document.full_text: sprint nextel corp is close to completing a $2 billion-a-year network sharing agreement with hedge fund billionaire phil falcone's lightsquared telecommunications venture, sources familiar with the matter said on wednesday.
document.title: lightsquared near $2 billion a year sprint deal: sources
lines_and_colors: sprint nextel corp is close to completing a $2 billion-a-year network sharing agreement with hedge fund billionaire phil falcone's lightsquared telecommunications venture, sources familiar with the matter said on wednesday.
